jacdac.DotMatrixReg.Brightness:
Read-write ratio u0.8 (uint8_t). Reads the general brightness of the display, brightness for LEDs. `0` when the screen is off.
* ```
const [brightness] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u0.8")
```
jacdac.DotMatrixReg.Columns:
Constant # uint16_t. Number of columns on the screen
* ```
const [columns] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u16")
```
jacdac.DotMatrixReg.Dots:
Read-write bytes. The state of the screen where dot on/off state is
stored as a bit, column by column. The column should be byte aligned.
* ```
const [dots] = jdunpack<[Buffer]>(buf, "b")
```
jacdac.DotMatrixReg.Rows:
Constant # uint16_t. Number of rows on the screen
* ```
const [rows] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u16")
```
jacdac.DotMatrixReg.Variant:
Constant Variant (uint8_t). Describes the type of matrix used.
* ```
const [variant] = jdunpack<[jacdac.DotMatrixVariant]>(buf, "u8")
```
modules.DotMatrixClient: A rectangular dot matrix display, made of monochrome LEDs or braille pins.
modules.DotMatrixClient.brightness: Reads the general brightness of the display, brightness for LEDs. `0` when the screen is off.
modules.DotMatrixClient.columns: Number of columns on the screen
modules.DotMatrixClient.rows: Number of rows on the screen
modules.DotMatrixClient.setBrightness: Reads the general brightness of the display, brightness for LEDs. `0` when the screen is off.
modules.DotMatrixClient.variant: Describes the type of matrix used.
